Description of incident: AeroGrow International Inc. informed customers of a data breach to their online servers when malware was detected on their system from October 15, 2014 through April 27, 2015. The information compromised included names, addresses, payment card account numbers, expiration dates, and CCV/CVV numbers. The company is providing free access to ProtectMyID Elite through Experian. For questions call 1-866-348-1808 from 8 am through 5 pm Mountain Time, Monday through Friday. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-56231
